document_data.name: Myrvek
document_data.mainbody: '''Myrvek of Gracklstugh''' was a [[derro]] merchant and savant who lived in the [[Underdark]] in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was of the [[Hakrett]] clan.
document_data.Personality:
The derro savant sold wares in the area near [[Rilauven]], such as magical gear. He was also in the possession of some rare [[gem]]s, but did not sell these. Myrvek had an odd personality, and may become hostile if insulted.

Despite their racial differences, he took up the company of fellow merchants [[Heggr Splitsteel]] and [[Wode the Guileful]].

Myrvek would fight his enemies with his [[quarterstaff]] and magical [[spells]].
